breakdowns.description: Given numbers should be added and the output shared.
conditions: Output can be negative or positive.
There should not be zero as an input.

breakdowns.description: Given two numbers, the greater number should be subtracted by the smaller one.
conditions: The greater number must be subtracted by the smaller one.
Output can be negative or positive.
Input numbers can be negative or positive.
There should not be zero as an input.

breakdowns.description: Given two numbers, multiply the numbers and share the output.
conditions: Output can be negative or positive.
Input numbers can be negative or positive.
There should not be zero as an input.

breakdowns.description: Given two numbers, divide the numbers and get the output.
conditions: Should not be divided by zero.
Always handle the exception of dividing by zero.
Input numbers can be negative or positive.
There should not be zero as an input.
